Package org.mitre.synthea.world.concepts

Class HealthRecord

java.lang.Object
org.mitre.synthea.world.concepts.HealthRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class HealthRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
HealthRecord contains all the coded entries in a person's health record. This class represents a logical health record. Exporters will convert this health record into various standardized formats.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  HealthRecord.CarePlan  
    static class  HealthRecord.Code
    HealthRecord.Code represents a system, code, and display value.
    class  HealthRecord.Device
    Device is an implantable device such as a coronary stent, artificial knee or hip, heart pacemaker, or implantable defibrillator.
    class  HealthRecord.Encounter  
    static class  HealthRecord.EncounterType  
    class  HealthRecord.Entry
    All things within a HealthRecord are instances of Entry.
    class  HealthRecord.ImagingStudy  
    class  HealthRecord.Immunization

    • currentEncounter

      public HealthRecord.Encounter currentEncounter​(long time)
      Get the latest encounter or, if none exists, create a new wellness encounter.
      Parameters:
      time - the time of the encounter if a new one is created.
      Returns:
      the latest encounter (possibly newly created).

    • timeSinceLastWellnessEncounter

      public long timeSinceLastWellnessEncounter​(long time)
      Return the time between the supplied time and the time of the last wellness encounter. If there are no wellness encounter return Long.MAX_VALUE.
      Parameters:
      time - the time to measure from
      Returns:
      the time difference, negative if time is before the first wellness encounter).

    • observation

      public HealthRecord.Observation observation​(long time, java.lang.String type, java.lang.Object value)
      Add an observation with the supplied properties to the current encounter.
      Parameters:
      time - time of the observation.
      type - type of the observation.
      value - value of the observation.
      Returns:
      the new observation.

    • multiObservation

      public HealthRecord.Observation multiObservation​(long time, java.lang.String type, int numberOfObservations)
      Add a new observation for the specified time and type, move the specified number of observations (in reverse order) from the encounter to sub observations of the new observation. If the encounter does not have the specified number of observations then none are moved and a new empty observation results.
      Parameters:
      time - time of the new observation.
      type - type of the new observation.
      numberOfObservations - the number of observations to move from the encounter to the new observation.
      Returns:
      the new observation.

    • getLatestObservation

      public HealthRecord.Observation getLatestObservation​(java.lang.String type)
      Get the latest observation of the specified type or null if none exists.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of observation.
      Returns:
      the latest observation or null if none exists.

    • conditionStart

      public HealthRecord.Entry conditionStart​(long time, java.lang.String primaryCode)
      Return an existing Entry for the specified code or create a new Entry if none exists.
      Parameters:
      time - the time of the new entry if one is created.
      primaryCode - the type of the entry.
      Returns:
      the entry (existing or new).

    • conditionEnd

      public void conditionEnd​(long time, java.lang.String primaryCode)
      End an existing condition if one exists.
      Parameters:
      time - the end time of the condition.
      primaryCode - the type of the condition to search for.

      stateName - the state to search for.

    • conditionActive

      public boolean conditionActive​(java.lang.String type)
      Check whether the specified condition type is currently active (end is not specified).
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the condition.
      Returns:
      true of the condition exists and does not have a specified stop time, false otherwise.

      primaryCode - the type of allergy.
      Returns:

    • useSupply

      public HealthRecord.Supply useSupply​(long time, HealthRecord.Code code, int quantity)
      Track the use of a supply in the provision of care for this patient.
      Parameters:
      time - Time the supply was used
      code - SNOMED Code to identify the supply
      quantity - Number of this supply used
      Returns:
      the new Supply entry

    • report

      public HealthRecord.Report report​(long time, java.lang.String type, int numberOfObservations)
      Add a new report for the specified time and type, copy the specified number of observations (in reverse order) from the encounter to the new report. If the encounter does not have the specified number of observations then all of the encounter observations are copied to the report.
      Parameters:
      time - time of the new report.
      type - type of the new report.
      numberOfObservations - the number of observations to copy from the encounter to the new report.
      Returns:
      the new report.

      Starts an encounter of the given type at the given time.
      Parameters:
      time - the start time of the encounter.
      type - the type of the encounter.
      Returns:

    • medicationStart

      public HealthRecord.Medication medicationStart​(long time, java.lang.String type, boolean chronic)
      Get an existing medication of the specified type or create one if none exists. If chronic is true the medication will be added to the list of chronic medications whether it already exists or is created.
      Parameters:
      time - the time of the medication if a new one is created.
      type - the type of the medication to find or create.
      chronic - whether the medication is chronic.
      Returns:
      existing or new medication of the specified type.

    • medicationEnd

      End a current medication of the specified type if one exists.
      Parameters:
      time - the end time of the medication.
      type - the type of the medication.
      reason - the reason for ending the medication.
